title: OBAGI Nu-Derm exfoderm forte exfoliation enhancer net wt. 2.oz.
description: Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte -- 2 oz.Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte is an alpha-hydroxy acid that removes old skin cells while promoting new skin cells for a lighter, brighter, firmer complexion. Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte is for skin that needs deeper exfoliation.6% glycolic acid, 4% lactic acidPenetrates deep into the skinReturns skin to a soft, beautiful, comfortable state of balanceEspecially Suited For:Normal and oily skinEssential Elements:Obagi Nu-Derm Exfoderm Forte comes in a 2-oz. bottle.For Best Effect:Apply Exfoderm Forte in a thin layer to the skin once a day or as directed by a physician.

title: Obagi Foaming Gel Cleanser-6.7 oz
description: Deep Cleansing Gel FormulaEnvironmental pollutants, makeup and other impurities can damage your skin's natural moisture. Obagi Foaming Gel Cleanser helps remove all these impurities with a gentle formula that leaves skin clean and soft. It gives great results even on oily skin and is gentle to use.Deep cleansing gelLeaves skin soft and freshWashes away pollutantsThis gel cleanser is ideal to clean your face off makeup and pollutants like dirt and oil. It can help clean skin for a fresher feeling.Just For You:All skin typesA Closer Look:Obagi Foaming Gel Cleanser is a blend of herbs, natural cleansers and aloe vera that works together to give you clean and smooth skin. It cleans skin gently and soothes without damaging the moisture content of your skin.Get Started:Apply the gel on damp face and neck with wet fingertips. Massage on your face and rinse off thoroughly.
